description: Lists the resource grouping recommendations suggested by Resilience Hub for your application.

nested_items.name: groupingRecommendations
nested_items.description: List of resource grouping recommendations generated by Resilience Hub.

nested_items.name: confidenceLevel
nested_items.description: Indicates the confidence level of Resilience Hub on the grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the creation time of the grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: groupingAppComponent
nested_items.description: Indicates the name of the recommended Application Component (AppComponent).

nested_items.name: appComponentId
nested_items.description: Indicates the identifier of an AppComponent.

nested_items.name: appComponentName
nested_items.description: Indicates the name of an AppComponent.

nested_items.name: appComponentType
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of an AppComponent.

nested_items.name: groupingRecommendationId
nested_items.description: Indicates all the reasons available for rejecting a grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: recommendationReasons
nested_items.description: Indicates all the reasons available for rejecting a grouping recommendation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: rejectionReason
nested_items.description: Indicates the reason you had selected while rejecting a grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: Indicates the resources that are grouped in a recommended AppComponent.

nested_items.name: logicalResourceId
nested_items.description: Indicates the logical identifier of the resource.

nested_items.name: eksSourceName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service cluster and namespace this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: Identifier of the resource.

nested_items.name: logicalStackName
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudFormation stack this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: resourceGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource group that this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: terraformSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the Terraform S3 state file this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: physicalResourceId
nested_items.description: Indicates the physical identifier of the resource.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that owns the physical resource.

nested_items.name: awsRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region that the physical resource is located in.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: Identifier of the physical resource.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of physical resource identifier.
AWS::ECS::Service.
AWS::EFS::FileSystem.
AWS::ElasticLoadBalancingV2::LoadBalancer.
AWS::Lambda::Function.
AWS::SNS::Topic.

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: Indicates the resource name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: Indicates the resource type.

nested_items.name: sourceAppComponentIds
nested_items.description: Indicates the identifier of the source AppComponents in which the resources were previously grouped into.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: Indicates the confidence level of the grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of grouping resources into AppComponents.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Null, or the token from a previous call to get the next set of results.
